sentences.sentence: Urge you to keep a jimpness figure by reference of your stature, avoirdupois, etc.
sentences.translation: 通过对人的身高、体重等值进行参考，督促你保持苗条的体型。

sentences.sentence: Conclusion: Polygala fall ax Hemsl has effects on increasing avoirdupois of thymus gland.
sentences.translation: 结论：黄花倒水莲提取物能增加小鼠的体重和胸腺的重量。

sentences.sentence: Avoirdupois of cadmium exposure group and co-exposure group were less than control group.
sentences.translation: 染镉组和联合染毒组出现体重降低现象；
